Text stepper.

```js
require("./demo.css");

class MobileStepperExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { steps: 5, activeStep: 0 };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <div className="demo-mobile-stepper">
        <MobileStepper>
          <MobileStepperHeader>
            <MobileStepperHeaderText>
              Step {this.state.activeStep + 1} of {this.state.steps}
            </MobileStepperHeaderText>
          </MobileStepperHeader>
          <MobileStepperBody>Body</MobileStepperBody>
          <MobileStepperFooter>
            <MobileStepperBackButton
              disabled={this.state.activeStep === 0}
              onClick={() =>
                this.setState({ activeStep: this.state.activeStep - 1 })
              }
            >
              Back
            </MobileStepperBackButton>
            <MobileStepperNextButton
              disabled={this.state.activeStep === this.state.steps - 1}
              onClick={() =>
                this.setState({ activeStep: this.state.activeStep + 1 })
              }
            >
              Next
            </MobileStepperNextButton>
          </MobileStepperFooter>
        </MobileStepper>
      </div>
    );
  }
}

<MobileStepperExample />;
```

Dot stepper.

```js
require("./demo.css");

class MobileStepperExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { steps: 5, activeStep: 0 };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <div className="demo-mobile-stepper">
        <MobileStepper>
          <MobileStepperHeader>
            <MobileStepperHeaderText>
              Step {this.state.activeStep + 1} of {this.state.steps}
            </MobileStepperHeaderText>
          </MobileStepperHeader>
          <MobileStepperBody>Body</MobileStepperBody>
          <MobileStepperFooter>
            <MobileStepperBackButton
              disabled={this.state.activeStep === 0}
              onClick={() =>
                this.setState({ activeStep: this.state.activeStep - 1 })
              }
            >
              Back
            </MobileStepperBackButton>
            <MobileStepperDots
              steps={this.state.steps}
              activeStep={this.state.activeStep}
            />
            <MobileStepperNextButton
              disabled={this.state.activeStep === this.state.steps - 1}
              onClick={() =>
                this.setState({ activeStep: this.state.activeStep + 1 })
              }
            >
              Next
            </MobileStepperNextButton>
          </MobileStepperFooter>
        </MobileStepper>
      </div>
    );
  }
}

<MobileStepperExample />;
```

Progress stepper.

```js
require("./demo.css");

class MobileStepperExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { steps: 5, activeStep: 0 };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <div className="demo-mobile-stepper">
        <MobileStepper>
          <MobileStepperHeader>
            <MobileStepperHeaderText>
              Step {this.state.activeStep + 1} of {this.state.steps}
            </MobileStepperHeaderText>
          </MobileStepperHeader>
          <MobileStepperBody>Body</MobileStepperBody>
          <MobileStepperFooter>
            <MobileStepperBackButton
              disabled={this.state.activeStep === 0}
              onClick={() =>
                this.setState({ activeStep: this.state.activeStep - 1 })
              }
            >
              Back
            </MobileStepperBackButton>
            <MobileStepperProgress
              steps={this.state.steps}
              activeStep={this.state.activeStep}
            />
            <MobileStepperNextButton
              disabled={this.state.activeStep === this.state.steps - 1}
              onClick={() =>
                this.setState({ activeStep: this.state.activeStep + 1 })
              }
            >
              Next
            </MobileStepperNextButton>
          </MobileStepperFooter>
        </MobileStepper>
      </div>
    );
  }
}

<MobileStepperExample />;
```
